title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Chinese Hackers Trade Stolen Data (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Chinese Hackers Trade Stolen Data (Audio)
description:
Christian Berthlesen, a federal court reporter for Bloomberg News, discusses charges against three Chinese hackers, who U.S. authorizes say made for than $4 million in illicit profits after hacking into the servers of top corporate law firms in New York. He speaks with June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law." Karen Moscow and Bob Moon discuss the days top legal stories.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
